Keywords: Imperial Guard , Ruler , Shi'ar , Starjammers , X-Men
Real Name: Lilandra Neramani
Special Powers
STAR-CROSSED LOVERS: When adjacent to a character named Professor X, both characters increase their Leadership rolls +1.
MAJESTRIX OF THE SHI'AR EMPIRE: Leadership, Mastermind. When Lilandra Neramani uses Leadership and succeeds, you may instead generate a XMRF #009 Shi'ar Soldier on click #1. // UNIQUE MODIFIER - Friendly characters with the Shi'ar keyword that occupy or are adjacent to 1+ Shi'ar Flag light objects modify defense +1.
